text: {{Infobox settlement | settlement_type = City | name = Compton, California | official_name = | image_skyline = | image_seal = Seal of Compton, California.svg | nickname = Hub City | motto = Birthing a New Compton | image_map = File:Los Angeles County California Incorporated and Unincorporated areas Compton Highlighted 0615044.svg | map_caption = Location within Los Angeles County, California | image_map1 = | mapsize1 = | map_caption1 = | pushpin_map = Los Angeles#California#USA | pushpin_map_caption = Location within Los Angeles Metropolitan Area##Location within California##Location within the United States | pushpin_relief = 1 | pushpin_label = Compton | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = Los Angeles | established_title = Incorporated | established_date = May 11, 1888 | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 10.12 | area_total_km2 = 26.20 | area_land_sq_mi = 10.03 | area_land_km2 = 25.97 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.09 | area_water_km2 = 0.23 | area_water_percent = 1.03 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_ft = 69 | elevation_m = 21 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 95740 | population_rank = 87th in California | population_density_km2 = 3686 | population_density_sq_mi = 9548 | timezone = Pacific | utc_offset = −8 | timezone_DST = PDT | utc_offset_DST = −7 | postal_code_type = ZIP codes | postal_code = 90220–90224 | area_code_type = Area codes | area_code = 310/424 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = | blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs | blank1_info = , | website = }} Compton is a city in Los Angeles County, California. It is southeast of Los Angeles, and is on the west side of the Los Angeles River. One stream that flows through it is called Compton Creek. The city's total land area is 10.2 square miles (26.4 square kilometers). The city, incorporated in 1888, now has a population of 95,740 (as of 2020). The city was known for having one of the highest crime rates in the United States. Compton has been experiencing gentrification. Compton now has a large Latino and Mexican population. African, Italian, Belizean, Irish, and Jamaican are the most common ancestries. Spanish and Tagalog are the most common foreign languages. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California Category:1888 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in California
title: Compton, California
